snippet.title: Reptilian Rising | PC Single-Player Tactics RPG | Gameplay First Look
snippet.description:
Let's take a look at Reptilian Rising by Gregarious Games & Robot Circus. A digital tabletop RPG where players must guide a cast of super-famous heroes from different eras against the Reptilian menace. Einstein, Cleopatra, Caesar are some of the characters you will control on 80s-style grid-based maps. Reptilian Rising is a single-player game with a PVP online mode. Actually in development and expected for Spring 2022 on PC. A demo is available right now.
#turnbased #SinglePlayer #DigitalTabletop

About Reptilian Rising
When genocidal Reptilians invade from out of time, only the greatest heroes in history can stop them! Assemble a team of humanity’s best from Cleopatra to Einstein and stop the Reptilian Rising in this totally tubular turn-based strategy, time-traveling battle for humanity’s survival (no pressure).
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1625460/Reptilian_Rising/
